oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis, structural parameters and superconducting properties of 1201-type (hg, m)sr2cuo4+delta (m = cr, mo or re): an overview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAMURUGAN, S
PRAKASH, O
PADALIA, BD
SELVAM, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cu-o system
neutron powder diffraction
mercury-based superconductors
hg-based superconductors
high-pressure synthesis
x-ray-diffraction
t-c
crystal-structure
k superconductor
chemical stabilization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A brief overview of the current state of development of 1201-type, Ba-free, mercury cuprates, (Hg, M)Sr2CuO4+delta (M = Cr, Mo or Re), is presented. Our focus here is confined to synthesis methods, chemical stabilization, structural parameters and superconducting properties of this Hg/Sr 1201 system.
